name: Under Armour Unisex UA Heatgear Locut, Breathable Trainer Socks, Compression Socks
review: Excellent quality - very well made. Comfy, robust, good looking and reasonably priced.They wash well with minimal bobbling.Different degrees of ankle coverage available too.What's not to like?
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2024

name: Under Armour Unisex UA Heatgear Locut, Breathable Trainer Socks, Compression Socks
review: I recently purchased the Under Armour Unisex UA Heatgear Locut, and I must say, they have quickly become my favourite pair of trainer socks! The HeatGear fabric does an incredible job of keeping my feet cool and dry, even during the most intense workouts. It's perfect for those long runs or HIIT sessions when you really work up a sweat.The anti-odour technology is a game-changer. We all know how trainer socks can get after a good workout, but these socks have remained fresh even after multiple uses. This is definitely a testament to the quality of the materials used, which is a blend of 97% Polyester and 3% Elastane. The socks are lightweight yet durable, providing just the right amount of cushioning without feeling too bulky.But what really sets these socks apart is the dynamic arch support. As someone who has struggled with arch pain in the past, this feature has provided the support and comfort I need to power through my workouts without any discomfort.All in all, the Under Armour Unisex UA Heatgear Locut, Breathable Trainer Socks, Cushioned Low Cut are an excellent investment for anyone in need of a high-quality, comfortable, and supportive pair of trainer socks. They have exceeded my expectations in every way, and I will definitely be purchasing more in the future!
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 25 February 2023

name: Under Armour Unisex UA Heatgear Locut, Breathable Trainer Socks, Compression Socks
review: Excellent running socks, nice and thick and comfortable. They last forever and are my go to for running socks.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 24 January 2024

name: Under Armour Unisex UA Heatgear Locut, Breathable Trainer Socks, Compression Socks
review: I was looking for some more breathable socks and came across these. The price was great at around £7 at the time and from a good brand like under armour i was pretty happy. They are comfortable, keep my feet cooler than some of my other socks and are made well enough that i expect them to last a while. Overall i would buy these again.
date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 19 October 2023
